Articles.Content: Alright, I'm in the process of building a large mothership, with a docking bay and everything. I'm trying to make it as cool as possible, and I was wondering if there was a mod out there that allows me to repair damaged spacecrafts and other things. Please help me out because I haven't found anything yet

As far as I know, nothing out there can do such a thing. However, I DO know that KAS lets you attach fuel lines and the like to spacecraft, maybe that could work.

Oh, also: The devs have also said they'd like to increase EVA functionality, so maybe patience will pay!

Edit #2: Welcome to the forums, I notice this was your first post! XD

As Maximus said - there isnt really a repair option, but if you were to use KAS you could at least carry spare solar panels, fuel lines, structs etc etc. Means if you do have an incident you could jimmy up something that may work!

The Lazor mod by Romafer now has EVA welding. Haven't tried it yet but it sounds useful, just keep some spare spacecraft parts on the ship and use KAS or an orbital tug to maneuver them to the damaged craft, then weld.
